mapper.select: SELECT er.*,r.RECIPE_TITLE, r.RECIPE_URL, r.RECIPE_SEQ, r.RECIPE_IMG FROM (SELECT * FROM eating_record WHERE ID = #{id} AND TO_CHAR(EATING_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) er JOIN RECIPE r ON er.EATING_RECIPECODE = r.RECIPECODE ORDER BY CASE WHEN er.MEALTYPE = '아침' THEN 1 WHEN er.MEALTYPE = '점심' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eating_record WHERE id = #{id} and TO_CHAR(EATING_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT INGREDIENT,RECIPECODE,RI_AMOUNT FROM RECIPE_INGREDIENTS WHERE RECIPECODE = #{eating_recipeCode}
